query.statement:
SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN TPLST = '1000' THEN ZCAR ELSE 0 END) AS ZCAR1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN TPLST = '1000' THEN ZTON ELSE 0 END) AS ZTON1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN TPLST = '1100' THEN ZCAR ELSE 0 END) AS ZCAR2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN TPLST = '1100' THEN ZTON ELSE 0 END) AS ZTON2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN TPLST NOT IN ('1000','1100') THEN ZCAR ELSE 0 END) AS ZCAR3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN TPLST NOT IN ('1000','1100') THEN ZTON ELSE 0 END) AS ZTON3 ,SUM(ZCAR) AS ZCAR4 ,SUM(ZTON) AS ZTON4 FROM (
SELECT T2.TPLST AS TPLST ,SUM(T2.ZTON1 + T2.ZTON2 + T2.ZTON3 + T2.ZTON4 + T2.ZTON5 + T2.ZTON6 + T2.ZTON7 + T2.ZTON8 + T2.ZTON9 + T2.ZTON10 + T2.ZTON11 + T2.ZTON12 + T2.ZTON13 + T2.ZTON14 ) AS ZCAR ,SUM(T2.ZTON1*1 + T2.ZTON2*2.5 + T2.ZTON3*3.5 + T2.ZTON4*5 + T2.ZTON5*8 + T2.ZTON6*11 + T2.ZTON7*18 + T2.ZTON8*25 + T2.ZTON9*25 + T2.ZTON10*25 + T2.ZTON11*25 + T2.ZTON12*25 + T2.ZTON13*25 + T2.ZTON14*25 ) AS ZTON FROM SAPHEE.ZLET002 AS T2 WHERE T2.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND (T2.ZKNUM, T2.ZKNUM2) IN ( SELECT ZKNUM ,ZKNUM2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLET003 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PSPID LIKE #PJT#||'%')
AND T2.ERDAT = #ERDAT# AND T2.ZKNUM LIKE '_%'
AND T2.ZCANC <> 'X' GROUP BY T2.MANDT,T2.TPLST
UNION
SELECT T7.TPLST AS TPLST ,SUM(T7.ZTON1 + T7.ZTON2 + T7.ZTON3 + T7.ZTON4 + T7.ZTON5 + T7.ZTON6 + T7.ZTON7 + T7.ZTON8 + T7.ZTON9 + T7.ZTON10 + T7.ZTON11 + T7.ZTON12 + T7.ZTON13 + T7.ZTON14 ) AS ZCAR ,SUM(T7.ZTON1*1 + T7.ZTON2*2.5 + T7.ZTON3*3.5 + T7.ZTON4*5 + T7.ZTON5*8 + T7.ZTON6*11 + T7.ZTON7*18 + T7.ZTON8*25 + T7.ZTON9*25 + T7.ZTON10*25 + T7.ZTON11*25 + T7.ZTON12*25 + T7.ZTON13*25 + T7.ZTON14*25 ) AS ZTON FROM ( SELECT T6.MANDT AS MANDT ,T6.TPLST AS TPLST ,MAX(T6.ZTON1) AS ZTON1 ,MAX(T6.ZTON2) AS ZTON2 ,MAX(T6.ZTON3) AS ZTON3 ,MAX(T6.ZTON4) AS ZTON4 ,MAX(T6.ZTON5) AS ZTON5 ,MAX(T6.ZTON6) AS ZTON6 ,MAX(T6.ZTON7) AS ZTON7 ,MAX(T6.ZTON8) AS ZTON8 ,MAX(T6.ZTON9) AS ZTON9 ,MAX(T6.ZTON10) AS ZTON10 ,MAX(T6.ZTON11) AS ZTON11 ,MAX(T6.ZTON12) AS ZTON12 ,MAX(T6.ZTON13) AS ZTON13 ,MAX(T6.ZTON14) AS ZTON14 FROM SAPHEE.ZLET006 AS T6 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET007 AS T7 ON T6.MANDT = T7.MANDT AND T6.ZKNUM = T7.ZKNUM AND T6.ZKNUM2 = T7.ZKNUM2 WHERE T6.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND (T6.ZKNUM, T6.ZKNUM2) IN ( SELECT ZKNUM ,ZKNUM2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLET007 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PSPID LIKE #PJT#||'%')
AND T6.ERDAT = #ERDAT# AND T6.ZKNUM LIKE '_%'
AND T6.ZCANC <> 'X' GROUP BY T6.MANDT, T6.TPLST,T6.ZKNUM,T6.ZKNUM2) AS T7 WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY T7.MANDT,T7.TPLST
) AS LE002 WHERE 1=1
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
